chapters.title: Introduction to Data Structures
chapters.summary: This chapter explains what data structures are and why they are important.

chapters.title: Arrays and Linked Lists
chapters.summary: Covers linear data structures, arrays, dynamic memory, and linked list basics.

chapters.title: Stacks and Queues
chapters.summary: Describes stack (LIFO) and queue (FIFO), their operations and use cases.

chapters.title: Trees and Graphs
chapters.summary: Explains hierarchical data with trees and graph basics including traversal.

chapters.title: Intro to Operating Systems
chapters.summary: Basic OS concepts: what they do and how they work.

chapters.title: Memory Management
chapters.summary: Covers paging, segmentation, and virtual memory systems.

chapters.title: Process Scheduling
chapters.summary: Describes how operating systems manage CPU processes.
